backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping high-level feature requirements to involved frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the Valentine app.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Guide for local development and Internet Computer deployment with customization notes.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH-themed romantic color variables with animation utilities.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up metadata and loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component managing scene transitions and user interactions for prank, transition, proposal, and victory states.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Confet: Canvas-based confetti explosion animation triggered during the victory scene.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Cracki: Animated SVG heart that progressively cracks using timed stroke-dashoffset changes.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Evasiv: Interactive NO button that dodges user attempts with random movement and escalating reactions.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Glitch: Glitchy transition screen used between the 404 prank scene and the proposal scene.
frontend/src/components/valentine/HeartP: Floating heart particle elements creating a subtle upward drifting background effect.
frontend/src/components/valentine/HeartR: Falling heart animation used as a celebratory effect in the victory scene.
frontend/src/components/valentine/MusicT: A button that toggles background music playback using an Audio element and displays volume icons.
frontend/src/components/valentine/scenes: Renders the glitchy 404 prank screen with heart particles, a cracking heart, and themed text.
Shows the proposal scene with a romantic heading, a YES button callback, and an evasive NO button.
Displays the celebratory victory screen with confetti, falling hearts, a customizable message, and an image.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity login, identity loading, and status management.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining fonts, theme variables, animations, and romantic visual effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom romantic colors, fonts, utilities, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature definitions, requirements, and state for the Valentineâ€™s prank site.
